content: --गुण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} consisting of three threads; व्रताय मौंजीं त्रिगुणां बभार यां <ls>Ku. 5. 10.</ls> {2} three-times repeated, thrice, treble, threefold, triple; सप्त व्यतीयुस्त्रिगुणानि तस्य (दिनानि) <ls>R. 2. 25.</ls> {3} containing the three Guṇas सत्व, रजस and तमस् (--णं the Pradhāna (in Sān. <ab>phil.</ab>) {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} three times; in three ways' (--णाः {%<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>pl.</ab> the three qualities or constituents of nature; त्रयीमयायत्रिगुणात्मन नमः <ls>K. 1.</ls> (--णा {1} Māyā or illusion (in Vedānta <ab>phil.</ab>). {2} an epithet of Durgā
